author: abstractalgorithms
message:
feat: replace viewer count with subscriber count in HomePageWrapper

feat: enhance LearningPathCard to use contextual images based on usage

feat: update PostCard to utilize contextual images for better display

fix: modify PostHeader to use contextual images for cover display

refactor: streamline RelatedPosts to use contextual images for consistency

fix: improve SearchModal by removing mock API and implementing real search

feat: implement Firestore-based subscriber count retrieval

feat: add image utility functions for better image handling and fallbacks

feat: introduce status field in Post interface for draft/published management

feat: add functionality to filter posts by status for admin use

test: add tests for getPostBySlug functionality to ensure reliability
